workshop.title: Discover the Art of Perfumery
workshop.description: Join our exclusive workshops where you'll learn the secrets of crafting your own signature scent. Our expert perfumers will guide you through the intricate process of selecting and blending premium ingredients to create a fragrance that's uniquely yours.
workshop.notice: Each workshop is limited to 6 participants to ensure personalized attention. All materials and tools are provided, and you'll take home your own custom-made perfume.
